definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: The almond has the phenomenon of pistil and stamens ripe in different time.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃存在明顯的雌雄蕊異熟現象。

sentences.english: The androecium is borne on the fused corolla.
sentences.chinese: 雄蕊羣着生在聯合的花冠上。

sentences.english: The differentiation of stamen and gynoecium accompanied that of floret crown.
sentences.chinese: 雌雄蕊的發育與小花花冠分化同時進行。

sentences.english: Two abaxial parietal bundles extended into the inner whorl of androecium;
sentences.chinese: 兩束遠軸面隔膜束進入兩枚內輪雄蕊。

sentences.english: Flower petals are joined near the base and stamens alternate with the corolla lobes.
sentences.chinese: 花翼瓣在底部鄰接，雄蕊與冠片交錯。

sentences.english: Stamen is in the middle of a flower and may produce pollen.
sentences.chinese: 雄蕊長在花的中央，能產生花粉。

sentences.english: It is natural to want anther person to appreciate that.
sentences.chinese: 資訊科技是天然想要雄蕊的花粉囊人感激那。

sentences.english: Most flowering plant species bear hermaphrodite flowers with functional stamens and carpels.
sentences.chinese: 大多數有花植物着生具有功能性雄蕊和雌蕊的兩性花。

sentences.english: Comparatively, the frequency of variation on number of tepals was obvious higher than that of stamens.
sentences.chinese: 花被裂片數目變異的頻率明顯高於雄蕊數目變異。

sentences.english: The tepals were developed earlier than the stamens, both from the floret primordium.
sentences.chinese: 花的被片比雄蕊發育的要早，均由花原基發育而成。

sentences.english: Corollaceous weak pink, inside have purple spot, staminal filament does not have wool.
sentences.chinese: 花冠淡粉紅色，內間有紫色斑點，雄蕊花絲無毛。
雄蕊爲白色帶鉻黃色花粉囊。

sentences.english: The anther is tetrasporangiate and glandular tapetum.
sentences.chinese: 雄蕊花葯四室，腺質絨氈層。

sentences.english: Stamens ca. 3 mm, papillate -hairy on lower part of filament.
sentences.chinese: 雄蕊約3毫米，在花絲的下半部分上具乳突有毛。

sentences.english: Other plants bear unisexual flowers, with only stamens or carpels functional, and others reproduce asexually.
sentences.chinese: 其他植物具單性花，即只有一種功能性雌蕊或雄蕊。

sentences.english: The thread in the corolla is the short filament of a degenerated stamen.
sentences.chinese: 花冠筒內絲狀物爲退化雄蕊的短花絲。
